parameters.label: Advanced BRAINSABC file parameters

string-enumeration.label: Resampler InterpoatorType
string-enumeration.name: resamplerInterpolatorType
string-enumeration.description: Type of interpolation to be used when applying transform to moving volume. Options are Linear, NearestNeighbor, BSpline, WindowedSinc, or ResampleInPlace. The ResampleInPlace option will create an image with the same discrete voxel values and will adjust the origin and direction of the physical space interpretation.

integer-vector.name: medianFilterSize
integer-vector.label: Median Filter Size
integer-vector.description: The radius for the optional MedianImageFilter preprocessing in all 3 directions.

string-enumeration.name: filterMethod
string-enumeration.label: Filter Method
string-enumeration.description: Filter method for preprocessing of registration

boolean.name: atlasWarpingOff
boolean.label: Turn off warping from atlas to subject space.
boolean.description: Deformable registration of atlas to subject

integer-vector.name: gridSize
integer-vector.description: Grid size for atlas warping with BSplines
integer-vector.label: BSpline Grid Size

integer.name: debuglevel
integer.label: Debug option
integer.description: Display debug messages, and produce debug intermediate results. 0=OFF, 1=Minimal, 10=Maximum debugging.

boolean.name: writeLess
boolean.label: Write less
boolean.description: Does not write posteriors and filtered, bias corrected images

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
